short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Gateway to Calm in Every Tab. Transform every new tab into a mindful pause with minimalist breathing animations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In our fast-paced digital world, finding moments of tranquility can be challenging. Mindful Moment transforms this challenge into an opportunity, turning each new tab into a gentle reminder to breathe, refocus, and reset.

## How It Works

Every time you open a new tab, you're greeted with a soothing animation guiding you through a breathing exercise. Follow along for as long as you like â€“ even a few seconds can make a difference. Then, continue your browsing with a refreshed mind and a calmer outlook.

Mindful Moment doesn't expect you to complete a full session every time. Instead, it serves as a gentle reminder to stay present and breathe consciously throughout your day. Over time, these small moments accumulate, fostering a more mindful approach to your digital life.

Embrace the power of mindful breathing without leaving your browser. Let Mindful Moment be your companion in cultivating calm, one tab at a time.

## Key Features:

- Minimalist Design: Clean, distraction-free interface that encourages focus on your breath. Supports light, dark, and system color schemes to match your preferences and reduce eye strain.
- Intuitive Animations: Visually guided breathing exercises that are easy to follow and immediately calming.
- Variety of Breathing Styles: Choose from multiple techniques including resonance breathing and box breathing, or let the app surprise you with a random selection.
- Completely Offline: Your mindful moments stay private. No data collection, no internet required.
